meanings.definition: To fasten incorrectly with a button.
meanings.sent1: She kept misbuttoning her shirt, causing the buttons to pop off.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was misbuttoning his coat when it wouldn't close properly.
meanings.sent3: Misbuttoning her sweater made her look like she was wearing it backwards.
meanings.sent4: Misbuttoning can turn a simple task into a frustrating puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of misbuttoning echoed in the quiet room, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of mistakenly buttoning a garment.
meanings.sent1: Her misbuttoning of the dress left it hanging awkwardly on the hanger.
meanings.sent2: The misbuttoning of his shirt made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit featured a hilarious scene of misbuttoning a suit jacket.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos of the morning rush, misbuttoning became a common occurrence.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer cringed at the sight of misbuttoning on the runway.
